entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor is severely broken on iOS: (1) Does not auto-scroll down as new lines are added past max height, (2) Does not respond to touch to manually scroll down/up, (3) Causes visible frame lag in resizing parents when it resizes #17757
  • Binding a text property to the Label affects the scrolling performance on mac #17755
  • Nested Border's misbehave on iOS #17753
  • How to make status bar transparent for Modal Pages #17752

Closed

  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'android-arm64 #17725

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run hide on tapped code if window is null #17758
  • Improves Bindable SetValue performance #17756
    community ✨
  • Correctly expand rows/columns when grid padding #17750
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17749
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 SR1
